body:
Release Notes

Healthcare Insights 360 Team

With this release, the team is excited to implement an update within our geography selections and report grouping by geography.

Network360 Modules

Enhancements
Geography Selections throughout Network360 and Report Grouping by Geography
  • Within the United States, there are some rural areas that are not associated with a MSA (Metropolitan Statistical Areas). Now, you will be able to select these areas within the Geography fields by typing in “Rural”. Please note that some states do not have rural areas like these.
  • When you group results by MSA, you will see results for all the MSAs and a Rural which contains the results for the rural areas in the state that are not associated with a MSA.
Rebranding
  • Now, all emails generated through Network360 are updated with the new branding’s font and font color.
Accessibility
  • Updated the tooltips on the Manage Accessibility Analyses page to better explain the status of the analysis and needed actions to view the analysis in the future.
Adequacy
  • Updated the tooltips on the Manage Adequacy Analyses page to better explain the status of the analysis and needed actions to view the analysis in the future.
Fixes
Look up a Provider
  • Fixed an issue where the provider’s ID, NPI, and Client ID sometimes displayed outside of the grey information box.
